Fits well on my baby who is on the tall side! It’s 100% cotton so he is not super hot while sleeping and it’s just so darn cute. Love the brand for toddler clothes!
Adorable pajamas with hearts all over. I bought for my toddler granddaughter and they look and feel wonderful. She looks adorable in them!

The fit was good on my baby. Very cute pattern.

评论概述: Cute but the cuffs are way too tight
评论详情: I generally like Honest brand stuff, but while this two piece pajama set is really cute, it was hard for our 1 year old to wear much due to the cuffs on the shirt and pants being too tight. I had to really stretch them out before putting them on her. After a wash, they were back to being too tight (and I laundered as directed). The shirt and pant themselves fit fine, just the cuffs were an issue. The material was fairly soft and she seemed comfortable with temperature and moveability while wearing them.
Soft and cute print. It’s a REALLY snug fit, so I’d recommend to size up.
So cute
Beautiful but runs at least 1 size too small. Size up!

I ordered several pairs of these pajamas form my three children.  The designs are super cute.  The material is gentle and seem not to cause irritation to my son’s eczema.  Only downside is that these pajamas can take a long time to arrive!

My 3rd baby is tall and I couldn't get more than a couple wears from one piece outfits before she outgrew the length. I got these in 12m and they fit good with room to grow. Sleeves are tight but not unreasonable, to those who dont know: pjs need to fit snug in case of fire. They look cute on her, I got another pattern too and will definately be buying more. Quality is nicer than I expected, had some honest onesies handed down to us that looked pretty mis shaped and ragged with raw seams so I avoided the brand.
I order these in 4t so my toddler would grow into them. They are true to size and very comfy. They also are meant to be fitted so they have a little stretch.

HonestBaby Baby Organic Cotton 2-Piece Snug Fit Pajama Set is designed to be a tight fit on your little one to avoid loose baggie clothing. My son has huge feet and sometimes it's a challenge to get his foot through the cuff without stretching them a bit. The print is cute and is black and white with cartoonish skulls and cross bones. The fabric is soft and breathable. It washes well without the printed design fading and there was no shrinkage after washings. The elastic waist band is pretty thick and hefty and I don't see it wearing out any time soon. Baby items are always giftable and honest baby is a great brand.

These PJs are so soft.  The majority of their clothes are similar to the sizing of Carter's clothes.  My little one is 7months and in the 50th percentile for all his measurements. This particular outfit fits as expected.  And my little one still has a little room to grow. The pattern is fun and has clean lines.  I wash it in warm water and dried it on heat.  I didn't notice any bleeding of the colors and I don't believe it shrank any even though it fits a little small now.
The arms were too skinny for my son even if sized up one size but great quality otherwise
